name: COVID19LOINCValueSetForSARSRelatedCoronavirusRNAQualitativeResultsAllSources
title: COVID19 LOINC Value Set for SARS related Coronavirus RNA Qualitative Results, All Sources
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to detection of nucleic acids from SARS-related coronavirus RNA (including SARS coronavirus (SARS-CoV), SARS coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2), and SARS-like coronaviruses) in various specimens by PCR, with results provi),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes detection of nucleic acids from SARS-related coronavirus RNA (including SARS coronavirus (SARS-CoV), SARS coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2), and SARS-like coronaviruses) in various specimens by PCR, with results provided on a qualitative scale.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes SARS-CoV-2 specific testing.)
